TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AssemblySignatureKeyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class AssemblySignatureKeyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AssemblySignatureKeyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 從舊的、較簡單的強式名稱金鑰移轉到具有較強的雜湊演算法、較大的金鑰。

span.span: Provides migration from an older, simpler strong name key to a larger key with a stronger hashing algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的更大索引鍵是簽章金鑰。The new larger key is the signature key. 在之前的版本[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，已識別索引鍵相同的簽章金鑰。In versions before the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the signature key was identical to the identity key. 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、屬性可讓繼續的舊公開金鑰語彙基元和二進位大型物件 (BLOB)，以便繼續使用現有的組件參考的組件中繼資料。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the attribute allows the assembly metadata to continue to have the old public key token and binary large object (BLOB) so that existing assembly references continue to work. 它也可確保對應來自身分識別金鑰的擁有者。It also ensures that the mapping comes from an owner of the identity key. 屬性的目前狀態不一定代表強式名稱驗證會進行。The presence of the attribute does not necessarily mean that strong name validation takes place. 在一般的完全信任情況下，屬性一定不會考慮，因為永遠不會驗證強式名稱簽章。In common full-trust scenarios, the attribute is never considered, because strong name signatures are never validated. 不過，當要驗證沒有強式名稱簽章，強式名稱簽章和副署必須加以驗證。However, when the strong name signature does have to be validated, both the strong name signature and the countersignature must be validated. 組件的識別索引鍵沒有相同的簽章金鑰 （用於執行實際的簽章的金鑰和驗證）。The assembly’s identity key does not have to be identical to the signature key (the key used to do the actual signing and validation). 識別索引鍵可以對應至不同的 （更穩固） 簽署金鑰。The identity key can be mapped to a different (more robust) signing key. 這可讓您設定的組件中，身分識別和更新的簽署金鑰和演算法，更安全的版本。This lets you set the identity of an assembly, and update the signing keys and algorithms to more secure versions. 副署位址時，安全性考量的惡意組件宣告某些其他身分識別。The countersignature addresses security concerns when a malicious assembly claims some other identity. 例如，惡意 system.core.dll 的參考組件無法包含它的中繼資料中的 Microsoft 公開金鑰，並使用屬性來判斷是否有任何副署使用攻擊者的簽章金鑰的強式名稱驗證。For example, a malicious System.Core.dll assembly could contain the Microsoft public key in its metadata, and use the attribute to tell strong name validation to use the attacker’s signature key if no countersignature is present. 因此，它無法偽裝成強式名稱驗證的 Microsoft 組件。Thus, it could masquerade as a strong name-validated Microsoft assembly. 如需如何使用這個新屬性的組件的簽章資訊，請參閱[進階強式命名](~/docs/framework/app-domains/enhanced-strong-naming.md)。For information about how to sign assemblies for use with this new attribute, see [Enhanced Strong Naming](~/docs/framework/app-domains/enhanced-strong-naming.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string publicKey, string countersignature) cil managed
Public Sub New (publicKey As String, countersignature As String)

param.name: countersignature
param.span: 副署，也就是強式名稱金鑰的簽章金鑰部分。

span.span: The countersignature, which is the signature key portion of the strong-name key.

summary.span: 使用指定的公開金鑰和副署，建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class by using the specified public key and countersignature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 Sn.exe 產生這個建構函式的參數。Use Sn.exe to generate the parameters for this constructor. ```console sn -a IdentityPubKey.snk IdentityKey.snk SignaturePubKey.snk ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Countersignature As String
public: property System::String ^ Countersignature { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個組件的強式名稱副署。

span.span: Gets the countersignature for the strong name for this assembly.
The countersignature for this signature key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 副署代表的公開金鑰簽署時的識別索引鍵。The countersignature represents the public key that is signed by the identity key.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PublicKey As String
public: property System::String ^ PublicKey { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用來簽署組件之強式名稱的公開金鑰。

span.span: Gets the public key for the strong name used to sign the assembly.
The public key for this assembly.
